KRK Road to Success

Municipal Pre-acceleration Program

7-9.11.2016, Kraków

Aplication closed

Join
public eventsBecome
a volunteer

About the program

KRK Road to Success is a great opportunity for startups and founders who want to move forward with their projects. During the acceleration program you will have a chance to show your project to investors and mentors, get valuable feedback, learn a lot and advance your project. You will finish the program with knowledge how to present your project and improved pitchdeck and presentation what will boost your chances of attracting a good investor or joining longer acceleration or incubation program.

This also a great occasion for startups from abroad to learn how Polish and Krakow startup ecosystem works, meet people from investment funds, corporations and startups and gain valuable connections.

Join public event

Meet our awesome mentores and speakers

Join now!

Program's benefits

Get feedback

Challenge their business idea with experienced entrepreneurs and investors from Poland and abroad

Pitching

Pitch is key to their success, learn how to do it perfectly

Competition

There always is competition, discover great ways to present competitive background

1-on-1 sessions

Discuss their probelms and gather valuable insights from mentors during 1-on-1 sessions

#omgKRK

Get to know the startup ecosystem in Kraków and see how you can help and benefit

Startups

Meet founders from other startups, exchange experiences and learn from each other

Poland

Learn how to do business here and benefits of opening company in Poland

Investors

Meet in person investors from Polish and Foreign Venture Capital Funds

Demo Day

Present their project during the Demo Day in front of investors and corporate partners

Meet our participants

Find a partner, friend or even employer

Join now!

Mentors

Greg Banaś
Ad Ventures

Greg is CEO and partner at Ad Ventures, consulting company and micro-venture. He is connecting startups with investors and corporate partners...

read more
Greg Banaś
Ad Ventures
Greg is CEO and partner at Ad Ventures, consulting company and micro-venture. He is connecting startups with investors and corporate partners, helping in negotations of investment conditions so they are fair for both sides. Ad Ventures is official partner for CEE of Chinese fund Hyperspace Capital.

Greg has been Head of Investments for Hubraum, corporate Seed Fund of Deutsche Telekom / T- Mobile group. He has also been a consultant at Ernst&Young, worked for Seed and Venture Capital funds and has been conducting business on his own as entrepreneur in various companies. He has been a member of a number of Supervisory Boards and was involved in IPO for NewConnect market.
Karol Szubstarski
Intel Capital

Karol is currently working as Associate / Investment Analyst in Intel Capital. Karol has joined the team in 2013 and his major responsibilities include analytical...

read more
Karol Szubstarski
Intel Capital
Karol is currently working as Associate / Investment Analyst in Intel Capital. Karol has joined the team in 2013 and his major responsibilities include analytical support for EMAR region (Central Eastern Europe, Middle East, Russia/CIS & Africa), mostly on pre-investment stage. On top of Analyst role responsibilities - Karol is actively involved in other elements of Investment process such as opportunities sourcing, due diligence etc. Prior to this role he was involved in Insight & Market Research team in Intel. Karol has also taken part in Talent Development Program in L’Oreal and was working in Sales DPGP department. Karol holds double major from Warsaw School of Economics & Poznan University of Economics. In his free time he enjoys sailing & traveling.
Dominik Majewski
Leonardo Fund

Dominik is anentrepreneur, investor and board member of The Leonardo Fund. He is responsible for strategic and operational actions in addition to the analysis...

read more
Dominik Majewski
Leonardo Fund
Dominik is anentrepreneur, investor and board member of The Leonardo Fund. He is responsible for strategic and operational actions in addition to the analysis of investment projects, carries out investments and constructs company's value. Dominik has been associated with the Venture Capital market for nearly 10 years. He has gained experience working in a bank, numerous business consulting firms and in seed and VC funds. He is the co-founder of several technological startups in the electronic, IT, education and entertainment sectors which successfully thrive on the world markets. Mentor and judge in startup events.
Maks Stempniewicz
Microsoft Poland

I’ve joined Microsoft more than two years ago to drive the awareness and adoption of the Azure cloud across the startup community in Poland...

read more
Maks Stempniewicz
Microsoft Poland
I’ve joined Microsoft more than two years ago to drive the awareness and adoption of the Azure cloud across the startup community in Poland. Currently, I’m leading and supporting all startup activities at Microsoft Poland, including Microsoft BizSpark, Imagine Cup, VC Speed Dating,Innovation Trends, and many more. On a daily basis I engage with promising startups and startup organizations in order to generate and manage relationship with hot and early stage companies. I work in collaboration with the VC community, corporations and business units at Microsoft to generate sales and funding opportunities.
Agata Kowalska
CK Legal

Agata specializes in mergers and acquisitions and legal aspects of VC/PE transactions. She has a vast experience of over 10 years in dealing with intellectual...

read more
Agata Kowalska
CK Legal
Agata specializes in mergers and acquisitions and legal aspects of VC/PE transactions. She has a vast experience of over 10 years in dealing with intellectual property law matters, especially related to the Internet. She cooperates with various funds and start-ups, mostly from the area of new technologies, conducts due diligence procedures of legal entities, advises and takes companies public (New Connect). She also is a highly skilled sports lawyer. She speaks at conferences and conducts numerous workshops for entrepreneurs, especially in the field of intellectual property law, copyright protection and investment agreements.

Michał Pukacz
iofthings
Coordinator and Executive Board member of The Polish Research and Development Cluster of the Internet of Things. The youngest member of National Chamber of Commerce committee of the urban economy, the largest independent business organization in Poland. Over ten years experience in trading working for such brands us Apple, SAD, iSource. Startup guy, passionate about new technologies, trying to pass as much as possible knowledge to the Lublin startup community. Co-organizer of two regular events of the IT industry, Aula Polska Lublin and Startup Weekend Lublin. Co-founder of the Lublin Academy of IT, where the main rule is that everyone can learn how to program.

Morizon S.A.

Michał Jaskólski
Morizon S.A.
Co-founder of Grupa Nokaut S.A. listed on the main Warsaw Stock Exchange market and Morizon S.A. - real estate company listed on NewConnect stock market. VP Product at morizon.pl and business angel. Online since 1997. Involved in creating online products since 1999. Used to be a web designer, web developer, senior analyst, team leader, project manager and product manager as freelancer and in many different companies including Wirtualna Polska and GetResponse. Fascinated by the new technologies, ideas and startups. Geek and early adopter. Captures the world around by taking photos and listens to alternative music (often - live).

Bartosz Józefowski
Krakowski Park Technologiczny
Manager of Technology Incubator at Krakow Technology Park where more than 30 startups develop their products. Member of the Board at seed fund FZKPT that has portfolio of 20 investments. Deeply involved in Krakow startup community #omgkrk, responsible mainly for relations with public administration. Leader of Desing Thinking workshops and business development trainings. Involved in several NGO organisations.
Norbert Młynarczyk
KM Kulicki Młynarczyk

Lawyer, cofounder and managing partner at Kulicki Młynarczyk law firm working with new technology sector companies and VC funds. He specialises in investment transactions...

read more
Norbert Młynarczyk
KM Kulicki Młynarczyk
Lawyer, cofounder and managing partner at Kulicki Młynarczyk law firm working with new technology sector companies and VC funds. He specialises in investment transactions. He advises on all steps of investment process. On behalf of the startups and VCs he is negotiating terms and structuring conditions of investment agreements. He specialties also in mergers and acquisitions and capital market regulations. He is involved in preparing emission prospects and due diligence activities. Expert and speaker at numerous events and conferences regarding new technologies.

Agata Kukwa
150sec
Multi skilled entrepreneur, talented in communications, non-exec director, startup mentor & public speaker. Since 2011 she helped over 30 early stage brands to enter the market or improve their online performance. She gained experience on venture capital market as a non-exec. communication director in one of the biggest Polish capital funds, Black Pearls VC. She also worked as an online personal brander improving professional image of managers and scientists. Currently cofounder and Communications Leader in 150sec.com, an online magazine covering tech & business news.

Konrad Pabiańczyk
ronisvision.com

Founded other startups previously and was a part of building products, marketing, sales, account management, legal and looking for investors and raising rounds. Experience in astrophysics research. Consulted on many other startup and corporate projects. Currently working between startups, corporate and VC on an international scale.

Michael Jezela
Hyperspace Capital

In 2015 he joined the Shanghai based Hyperspace Group to take care of the business development in Europe. Ever since he is actively supporting startups...

read more
Michael Jezela
Hyperspace Capital
Besides his job as a senior consultant in an international consultancy he founded his company "Megaelefant", an e-commerce shop for Indian clothing and accessories, in 2013. In 2015 he joined the Shanghai based Hyperspace Group to take care of the business development in Europe. Ever since he is actively supporting startups interested in expanding to China in every manner. Apart from that Michael is generating a concrete deal-flow for Chinese investors interested in European investment targets on the platform "InvesTarget". His experience on the entrepreneurial and investors side form the perfect condition for him to have a deep understanding of both perspectives.

Marcin Bielówka
INNOventure
Managing partner of INNOventure.io, an investment vehicle whose aim is to support innovative scientists, engineers, and entrepreneurs in developing and finding ways to commercialize their projects. Former CEO of Krakow Technology Park Seed Fund, where his activity resulted in investments which led to the establishment of over 20 companies; 13 of them have acquired further funding from other investors or have exited
Hila Glick
StarTau Tel Aviv

Hila is a design strategist and entrepreneur working as International partnership manager & Director, International Affairs at Tel Aviv University entrepreneurship center...

read more
Hila Glick
StarTau Tel Aviv
Hila is a design strategist and entrepreneur working as International partnership manager & Director, International Affairs at Tel Aviv University entrepreneurship center.( StarTAU) As the Director of International Affairs at Tel Aviv University Entrepreneurship Center, her main focus is to consult global entities on how to leverage their contributions and development in the startup and innovation arena, initiate new projects, and provide a platform to connect global corporations with the Israeli /international startup ecosystem. Hila manages communication between hundreds of leadingcompanies and their advanced technological solutions, mainly startups, to connect them with the relevant business partners and opportunities around the world. By working closely with diplomats, governmental organisations, and commercial partners, Hila has been able to create new paths for knowledge exchange and business collaboration. Hila have vast experience working in the design, entrepreneurship, and business sectors attaining diverse skills in project management, design directing, and developing a communications strategy through working with international partners in Europe, US, Japan, and China.
Ewa Jennifer Abel
Giza Polish Ventures

Partner at a VC fund Giza Polish Ventures, responsible for initial analysis of investment prospects, Business and Intellectual Capital Due Diligence...

read more
Ewa Jennifer Abel
Giza Polish Ventures
Partner at a VC fund Giza Polish Ventures, responsible for initial analysis of investment prospects, Business and Intellectual Capital Due Diligence, overseeing the investment process and monitoring of portfolio companies. Ewa holds an MSc in Finance degree from EDHEC Business School in Nice, France and a BA in Business and International Finance from Oxford Brookes in UK. She has previously worked as sales analyst in the investment banking sales department of Diamond Capital and as a research analyst at Cowry Asset Management in Lagos, Nigeria.

Piotr Przewrocki
QBN Seed Fund and Accelerator
Serial Enterpreneur, Business Angel, Invested in 23 tech companies both in Poland and abroad. Managing Partner and investor in QBN Seed Fund. As a part of investment QBN fund offers to startups an tailored made acceleration period in Silicon Valley or New York area. Love snowboarding and kitesurfing.

Adam S. Bartkowski
PolSource LLC
Serial entrepreneur. Founded company with no outside funding and grew them from 20 to 80 + people with revenue growth of 1200%. Organized operations in three geographies: Poland, UK and USA and achieved position of key global partner of Salesforce. and Major Fortune 200 businesses. He also transformed businesses from a services to a products companies and globalized them in both product and channel.

Paweł Budny
Orange
Expert R&D and Innovation Manager in Orange Labs, Orange Poland Marketing strategy, product management, business development and implementation management of new, innovative products with an emphasis on value proposition. Longtime manager of marketing teams responsible for product management, communication and implementation of sales targets. More than 10 years of experience in building marketing strategy, communication strategy and management of product lifecycle.

Partners

VIP dinner

VIP dinner will gather investors, mentors and representatives of city hall and corporations. Three best startups will also be invited and they will get a chance for a longer discussion without time pressure. What they can get out of that only depends on them.

See you there!
